categories.title: Welcome / Setup / Updates
categories.content:
HOW TO USE

This app includes several different tools you can use to achieve Peace Of Mind.

- Daily guided meditations: we suggest you do these twice per day. Once in the morning after you wake up, and once in the evening, usually before dinner time is best.

- Sleep meditations: you can play these on your phone to help you relax and have a peaceful deep sleep.

- Nature sounds and music: as you become more advanced in meditation, you may find you prefer to meditate without a guide. These nature sounds and relaxing music are good options so you can get in the meditative state without anything to distract you.

- Mindset Tracks: these help you to change your perspective and help you cultivate more of a masculine mindset. You can listen to these any time of the day. This is to be done ON TOP of the daily meditations, not as a replacement.

TECHNICAL SETUP

- Phone on airplane mode: We suggest you download all of the tracks while you have internet connection, then when you're using the app you can have your phone on Airplane mode.

- Turn off notifications in Telegram

SUPPORT

If you get stuck / membership questions, send an email: support@oscarvore.com

categories.title: Masculine Mindset

categories.usageInstructions: Listen any time of day. This is supplementary to daily meditations, not a replacement.

items.title: 15 Minutes
items.description: The best guided meditation to start and even useful for experienced meditators. Teaches core techniques to get out of your head, while explaining the practice of meditation. Start here. You can just do this same meditation for 6+ months.

items.title: 20 Minutes
items.description: This meditation teaches some different techniques to get into the meditative state. You can use vary between this one and the previous guided meditation for the first months of your meditative journey.

items.title: 15 Minutes
items.description: Guided meditation specifically designed to help you fall asleep

items.title: Thunder Sounds
items.description: 8-hour thunder soundscape for meditation, focus, or sleep

items.description: Bonus Spotify playlist for focus and concentration

items.description: Compilation of stoic quotes for mindset development

items.title: The Task Is To Be Good
